programme.title: Isolated
programme.desc: Five world class surfers travel to New Guinea in search of undiscovered waves, but end up discovering so much more.

programme.title: Empire of Surf
programme.desc: Be on the inside of how these parks and tech are put together.

programme.title: Noah: The Art of Surfing
programme.desc: Professional surfer Noah Beschen travels to Western Australia and Tahiti alongside filmmaker Andy Woodward to surf beautiful yet powerful waves before returning home to the North Shore of Oahu.

programme.title: Caveheart
programme.desc: Mason Ho takes his faithful companion far from their home in Hawaii and into foreign frigid waters in search for medieval liquid caves.

programme.title: Beyond the Green Veil
programme.desc: Beyond the Green Veil unveils how logging shapes access as surfers and skiers rethink conservation.

programme.title: Go Easy on the Zambezi
programme.desc: Take It Easy On The Zambezi, featuring Mikey February, Dylan Graves, and Harry Bryant, on what Graves calls the biggest adventure he's ever taken in search of surf, deep into the heart of Sub-Saharan Africa.

programme.title: Heavy Water
programme.desc: Heavy Water is a Michael Oblowitz film, produced by Red Bull Media House and All Edge Entertainment, that follows the life and times of Nathan Fletcher, part of the royal family of surfing and a key figure in big wave history.

programme.title: Havana Libre
programme.desc: After years of surfing being illegal, a diehard group of Cuban surfers fight to legitimize their passion. Havana Libre chronicles their fight in the face of political oppression, confronting borders and outdated ideologies along the way.

programme.title: Step into Liquid
programme.desc: Zigzagging from the waters off Ireland to Oahu's ripping North Shore, this documentary profiles the diverse and fascinating characters who have devoted their lives to catching the perfect wave.

programme.title: Kalani: Gift from Heaven
programme.desc: A short documentary film featuring waterman Kalani Lattanzi challenging the boundaries of Big Wave Surfing. Filmed in Nazare and Rio de Janeiro, he faces the biggest waves in the world, in the most pure form of wave riding: bodysurf.

programme.title: The Endless Summer
programme.desc: The crown jewel to ten years of Bruce Brown surfing documentaries. Brown follows two young surfers around the world in search of the perfect wave, and ends up finding quite a few in addition to some colorful local characters.

programme.title: Ind Ho Nesia
programme.desc: IND HO NESIA is a taste of our 2024 journey. Mostly surfing, trying to find fun waves, and bumping into go

programme.title: Caveheart
programme.desc: Mason Ho takes his faithful companion far from their home in Hawaii and into foreign frigid waters in search for medieval liquid caves.

programme.title: Between Fjords
programme.desc: Filip and Lukas Polach find purpose in Icelandâ€™s wild beauty, chasing slopes and icy waves.

programme.title: Surfing Morning of the Sun
programme.desc: Stunning contemporary surfing mixed with classic surfing from the 1970's. A inspirational homage to the classic surf films of the 1970's like Morning of the Earth. This is one the finest of its genre and noted for the original score.

programme.title: Not By Chance
programme.desc: Trevor Gordon builds a surfboard in 2 days, sails the Atlantic, and rides waves with it.

programme.title: Surprise Excitement Party
programme.desc: Transworld Surf presents Surprise Excitement Party. Starring Mark Healey, John Florence, Conner Coffin, Parker Coffin, Michel Bourez and many more.

programme.title: Ice Edge
programme.desc: Ice Edge follows surfers shaping ice boards, battling nature in a poetic tribute to Lofoten.

programme.title: The Arena: North Shore
programme.desc: Every winter on the North Shore of Oahu, the best surfers in the world come to charge the infamous Bonzai Pipeline to prove their worthiness. It is on the deadliest wave in the world where young surfer's careers are sprung into superstardom.

programme.title: The Essence of Surfing
programme.desc: The Essence of Surfing is a riveting surf documentary that gets to the heart of why surfing is the greatest sport in the world. Featuring surfers of all kinds, from the neighborhood grom to some of the greatest surfers to ever live, The Essence of Surfing uncovers what it is about this awesome sport that makes it a necessary part of each of their lives. Shot in the world's most beautiful locations by top notch Cinematographers Erik Ippel and Mike Prickett, this film is sure to hook and inspire anyone looking to get wet and catch some waves.

programme.title: The Longest Wave
programme.desc: THE LONGEST WAVE offers a rare glimpse into what motivates an athlete who has everything to lose to push his body and mind to the limit. A film about surf legend Robby Naish.

programme.title: Whistle of Wilderness
programme.desc: Whistle of Wilderness follows a young islander's journey through nature, mind, and life.

programme.title: Lady Killers
programme.desc: Lady Killers follows top female surfers risking it all, featuring Moore, Marks, and Simmers in 4K action.

programme.title: Trouble: The Lisa Andersen Story
programme.desc: Lisa Andersen is one of surfings few transcendent stars. 4x world champ and inductee into the Surfer Hall of Fame, she is a true surf icon. But this is not a story about surfing. Its the story of a woman brave enough to be vulnerable.

programme.title: View from a Blue Moon
programme.desc: See the sport of surfing as its never been captured before in John Florence and Blake Vincent Kuenys second signature release, this time in association with the award-winning film studio, Brain Farm.

programme.title: PAIGE
programme.desc: A closer look into the life of Paige Alms, one of the best big wave surfers in the world, as she trains mentally and physically for the 2017 Pe'ahi Challenge (Jaws) on Maui, conquering 40-50 foot waves, and inspiring the next generation.

programme.title: Paradigm Lost
programme.desc: Filmed over three years, in six countries, Paradigm Lost captures the highest level of water sports action in beautiful 4K. In between the action are heartfelt stories of the characters at the top of their sports.
